items.title: Jigar Patel advises profit booking after recent Nifty surge, picks three stock ideas for short term
items.description: While the Nifty 50 is currently trading at new highs, there are signs of caution. The daily RSI is showing negative divergence, and the index is facing resistance near a rising trendline.

items.description: The Nifty 50 may consolidate before showing the next leg of the upmove towards a new high. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.description: JSW Energy commissions its first 300 MW wind power project, boosting its renewable energy portfolio and targeting 20 GW capacity by 2030.

items.description: Zydus Lifesciences Share Price Today | Zydus Lifesciences has secured an exclusive licensing and supply agreement with the US-based Viwit Pharmaceuticals for two Gadolinium-based Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) contrast agents.

items.title: Macrotech Developers stock gets Nomuraâ€™s buy; strong growth, 30% upside seen
items.description: Nomura has given Macrotech Developers a buy rating with a target price of Rs 1,600 per share, anticipating a 30 percent upside driven by solid growth forecasts and strategic acquisitions.

items.title: Jefferies adds Emcure Pharma, IndiGo in model portfolio; HDFC Bank weightage rises
items.description: The increased weighting on India's largest lender, HDFC Bank, comes as analysts anticipate that banking stocks are approaching an inflection point

items.title: Adani Group sees heightened buying activity by mutual funds; net buying at over Rs 4,200 crore in August
items.description: In August, Adani Energy Solutions and Ambuja Cement saw the highest amount of mutual fund investments, with Rs 1,541 crore and Rs 1,308 crore, respectively. The surge in Adani Energy Solutions was fuelled by a $1 billion QIP, while Ambuja Cement's rise came from a Rs 4,250 crore block deal.

items.title: Sugar stocks rally as govt allows production of RS, ENA from sugarcane juice, B-Heavy molasses
items.description: Sugar stocks surged after the government greenlit the use of sugarcane juice and B-Heavy molasses for Rectified Spirit and Extra Neutral Alcohol production, boosting shares of major players like Bajaj Hindustan Sugar and Balrampur Chini Mills.

items.title: Kross shares make flat market debut at IPO price; miss GMP estimate
items.description: The Kross Limited initial public offer (IPO) completely misses grey market estimates where shares were trading at a premium of 10 percent.

items.title: Tolins Tyres shares make muted stock market debut, list flat at nearly IPO price
items.description: The Tolins Tyres initital public offer (IPO) listing gains completely miss grey market estimates where shares were trading at a premium of about 13 percent

items.title: SpiceJet, IndiGo stocks rise as domestic air traffic climbs in August
items.description: SpiceJet and IndiGo shares climbed on September 16, driven by heightened domestic airline competition and improved market share for IndiGo, which now commands 62.4 percent of the market.

items.title: Share Samadhan shares list at 1% discount to IPO price on BSE SME
items.description: Shares Samadhan's Rs 24-crore public offer was a fresh issue of 35 lakh shares

items.title: Gajanand International shares list at 17% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Gajanand International IPO wasn't well received by investors after it was subscribed to just 15.27 times over three days given the retail frenzy in the SME IPO space

items.title: HDFC Bank to declare Q2 financial results on October 19; trading window to be closed for insiders
items.description: HDFC Bank board will meet on Saturday, 19 October to consider India's largest bank's unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the July-September quarter.

items.title: Shubhshree Biofuels shares debut at 58% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: The Shubhshree Biofuels Energy SME IPO received robust investor interest after the issue was subscribed nearly 133 times.

items.title: KRBL, LT Foods, Kohinoor shares rise as Centre removes Minimum Export Price on Basmati
items.description: The international price of variants of Basmati had been falling between 15-25 percent in the recent, past due to fewer orders. For FY24, the export of Basmati rice fell by 10 percent to 4.10 million tonne.

items.title: BSE share price surges 17% to fresh record high amid heavy volumes
items.description: BSE stock soared over 17 percent, hitting an all-time high of Rs 3,448 on the NSE, driven by high trading volumes. In the past 12 months, the counter has zoomed 170 percent, more than doubling investors' money.

items.title: Union Bank of India jumps 6% as Investec upgrades stock to 'buy', sees 19% upside potential

items.title: Agri Picks Report September 16, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, The US Department of Agriculture has lowered its global oilseed output estimate for 2024-25 (May-Apr) by 3.1 mln tn to 687.42 mln tn in September, from 690.54 mln tn forecast last month.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on September 16
items.description: At the close, the Sensex was up 97.84 points or 0.12 percent at 82,988.78, and the Nifty was up 27.30 points or 0.11 percent at 25,383.80. About 2,080 shares advanced, 1,862 shares declined, and 85 shares unchanged.

items.title: Taking Stock: Markets break 3-day losing streak to hit record high
items.description: Broader indices also rallied to record high with the BSE midcap index ending on flat note, while smallcap index was up 0.3 percent.

items.title: Live: Nifty Hits New High Ahead Of Fed Meet This Week|Bumper Listing For Bajaj Housing| Closing Bell
items.description:
Nifty, Sensex hit new high ahead of Fed decision. Mid & smallcaps extend gaining streak. Market breadth in favour of gainers. India VIX cools further to below 13 level. Banks in good stead; metals & realty outperform. Defenives on the backfoot; FMCG, IT & pharma sulk. Join Nandita Khemka as she chats with Ashish Bahety, Technical and Derivative Research Analyst for more insights!
#stockmarket, #sharemarket #nifty #sensex #marketclosing
